release.action: Renamed method addTestCaseSteps to createTestCaseSteps in the the TL API.
Removed method updateTestCaseSteps that doesn't exist in the PHP XML-RPC API.
Removed method pushTestCaseSteps that doesn't exist in the PHP XML-RPC API.
Reformatted parts of the code using Java code style.
Added new parameters to TestCase (platform:Platform and featureId:Integer).
Added new parameters to TestCase (platform:Platform and featureId:Integer).
Removed bugs notes from javadoc headers (inherited from TL project, but deprecated here now).
